name: Spooky Factory
description:
After inheriting a deceased relatives’ factory, you discover it is haunted! Spirits are possessing the machinery and are not happy with your presence in the factory. Escape if you can!

Spooky Factory is a first-person survival horror game. With no weapon or armor to defend yourself from the factory’s malicious intentions, you must evade and deactivate traps and animated machinery to get out alive.
